data.title: BIG and Delta Pioneer the First Low-Carbon Nitrogen  in Thailand's Electronics Industry
data.description: BIG, a climate technology company, and  Delta Electronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited , a global leader in power management and IoT-based smart green solutions today announced a strategic partnership with BIG to advance the decarbonization of Thailand

data.title: Ex-minister’s father held in slaying of adopted son
data.description: A veteran  Prachin Buri  politician and father of a former cabinet minister is facing a murder charge in the  shooting  death of his adopted son, a provincial councillor, over what police say was a political dispute.

data.title: Charoen Pokphand Group: A Catalyst for Sustainable Human and Social Capital
data.description: Charoen Pokphand Group Co., Ltd (C.P. Group) has emphasised the critical role of the private sector in driving sustainable human and social capital during the sixth United Nations Global Compact Network Thailand (UNGCNT) Forum.

data.title: CP LAND Wins Marvel Award for Brand Excellence
data.description: C.P. LAND Public Company Limited (CP LAND), a prominent leader in Thailand’s real estate sector, has been honoured with the ‘Marvel Award’ at the TERRAHINT Brand Series 2024 seminar, hosted by TERRA BKK. This accolade acknowledges companies with exceptional challenger brand images, ranking closely to market leaders. CP LAND earned the highest Powerful Score Matrix rating across all criteria, with a total score of 54%—significantly surpassing the 42% average—particularly excelling in provincial and major city groups, where it was voted the “Most Trusted Brand” and “Most Familiar Brand.”

data.title: Chinese EV-maker starts assembly of Wuling at Thailand factory
data.description: Company sourcing 50% of parts locally, aims to increase it to 70%

data.title: TrueMoney partners with Carbonmark to drive climate action via app
data.description: The digital platform’s 20 million users can now offset their carbon emissions easily by purchasing packages that cost as little as 6 baht

data.title: Thailand emerges as Asia’s biggest market for branded residences
data.description: With over 68,000 units sold and an 11% year-on-year growth, cities like Bangkok and Phuket lead the surge as luxury residences attract wealthy Thai and foreign buyers

data.title: Queensland Health tightens protocol after virus samples disappear
data.description: The authorities are investigating the disappearance of 323 virus-containing vials from a public health lab in what is being called the ‘largest breach of biosecurity measures in history’

data.title: Pheu Thai dithers over charter change, leaving People's Party isolated
data.description: All eyes are on ruling party as Parliament reconvenes today for debate on changing 2017 Constitution

data.title: First frost on Doi Inthanon
data.description: CHIANG MAI – The first frost of this winter season was seen on Doi Inthanon on Thursday morning as the temperature fell as low as 4°C, the coolest this year.

data.title: 51 Innovations Honoured at International Innovation Awards 2024 Ceremony
data.description: As technology advances at an unprecedented pace with AI at the forefront of it, a crucial question emerges: How can humans and AI coexist harmoniously while upholding principles of integrity and ethics?

data.title: Thaksin shrugs off Sondhi’s claim that MOU44 benefits Cambodia
data.description: Former PM rejects allegation that controversial document signed during his tenure hands Thai territory to neighbouring country

data.title: Japan criminalises cannabis use as revised laws take effect
data.description: TOKYO - Japan started criminalising the use of cannabis and tetrahydrocannabinol (THC), a psychoactive chemical found in the plant, as revised laws took effect on Thursday amid growing concerns over drug abuse by young people.

data.title: Mitr Phol Leads Green Sugarcane Harvest for Sustainability
data.description: Mitr  Phol Group, a global leader in sustainable practices within the food products industry, continues its pioneering efforts to promote green sugarcane harvesting. For the 7th consecutive year, the company is purchasing sugarcane leaves through its “Let’s Green the Sugarcane” campaign, aiming to foster sustainable agricultural practices while providing cane growers with increased income opportunities.

data.title: Who is Pheu Thai’s ‘coup-killer’?
data.description: Prayut Siripanich, the MP behind the anti-coup bill, is no stranger to controversy. A decade ago, his amnesty proposal sparked turmoil

data.title: 19th INWEPF Steering Meeting and Symposium
data.description: Join us in exchanging global knowleage and technologies to promote improved water and rice ecosystem managemwnt, fostering sustainable water use among international networks and organizations.

data.title: Fresh storm alert for southern Thailand
data.description: Flooding and landslide alerts are in effect for all southern provinces near the Gulf of Thailand, with torrential rain forecast to pound the region until next Monday.

data.title: Mondelēz Thailand Drives Growth Through Consumer-Led Innovation
data.description: Mondelēz International (Thailand) Co., Ltd. has marked another exceptional year, driven by innovative marketing strategies and premium products that have resonated with Thai consumers. data.title: Bangkok's Air Quality Crisis Demands Urgent Action Now
data.description: Greater Bangkok continues to face severe PM2.5 pollution levels, with the Pollution Control Department warning residents about thick smog from farmland burning and stagnant air masses over the capital and surrounding provinces. Despite annual recurrence, effective solutions remain elusive.

data.title: Many Maha Sarakham residents claim to have been scammed
data.description: Complainants say they were conned into putting their money into real estate schemes by two unscrupulous financiers

data.title: National Defence Organisation Act to undergo further revisions
data.description: Defence Ministry Administration Act also requires improvements before going channels, Defence Minister Phumtham says

data.title: BIG and Delta Revolutionise Electronics with Low-Carbon Nitrogen
data.description: BIG, a climate technology leader, has partnered with Delta Electronics (Thailand) Public Company Limited, a global innovator in power management and smart green solutions, to usher in a new era of sustainability in Thailand’s electronics industry. Announced on December 9, this strategic collaboration introduces low-carbon nitrogen into the production of electronic components and parts (ITC), setting a groundbreaking precedent for sustainable manufacturing in the region.

data.title: South Korea's Yoon vows to fight 'until the very last minute'
data.description: SEOUL - South Korean President Yoon Suk Yeol on Thursday vowed to fight "until the very last minute" in a defiant address defending his shock decision last week to declare martial law and deploy troops to the country

data.title: Prachin Buri PAO chief in custody, suspected of links to man’s murder

data.title: Hun Sen suggests Saudis invest in Kingdom’s rice industry
data.description: Hun Sen, president of the Cambodian Senate, has urged Saudi Arabia to purchase rice from Cambodia and encourage Saudi investors to invest in Cambodia’s rice production sector, particularly in processing and exporting rice to Saudi Arabia.

data.title: Hun Sen suggests Saudis invest in Kingdom’s rice industry
data.description: Hun Sen, president of the Cambodian Senate, has urged Saudi Arabia to purchase rice from Cambodia and encourage Saudi investors to invest in Cambodia’s rice production sector, particularly in processing and exporting rice to Saudi Arabia.

data.title: Philippines expected to import record rice volume
data.description: Despite record production and ample stocks, the Philippines is expected to import a record volume of rice in the 2024-25 crop year, according to a report from the Foreign Agricultural Service (FAS) of the US Department of Agriculture.
